CustomField.description: A lookup to the TFN_Mapping object. Records of that object have a name (the TFN) and a DID Number. This field exists to feed the DID Number to the Routing Record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a Toll-Free Number. If a contact dials this phone number, the call should be managed by the corresponding CSP.
CustomField.label: Toll-Free-Number
